title: Remove 'Service is the highest duty' subtitle line from homepage founder section

requirements.text: Remove the English subtitle line 'Service is the highest duty' (translation/subtitle of the motto 'मानव सेवा परमो धर्मः') from the founder section on the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx). Only the Hindi motto text should remain; the English translation line must be deleted entirely.

quotes: Service is the highest duty YE LINE HATA DIJIYE

acceptanceCriteria: The text 'Service is the highest duty' does not appear anywhere on the Home page.
The Hindi motto 'मानव सेवा परमो धर्मः' remains visible in the founder section.
No other content in the founder section is removed or altered.

nonGoals: Removing or modifying the Hindi motto text 'मानव सेवा परमो धर्मः'.
Making any other changes to the Home page layout or founder section design.
